title: Avanti Feeds extends rally on stock split, bonus issue plan
content: The stock rallied 8% to Rs 1,980, extending its over 30% surge in past three trading sessions, after the company announced stock split from Rs 2 to Re 1 and issue of bonus shares in the ratio of 1:2.
